sqlList.sql: select '['||prop||']'||prop_name_zh AS REVALUE_ALL from T_LM_B_PROP where (:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (prop LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR prop_name_zh LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR pinyin_long LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR pinyin_short LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') order by prop
select '['||city_id||']'||name_cn AS REVALUE_ALL from t_lm_b_city where (:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (name_cn LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR NLS_LOWER(name_en) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') order by city_id

select '['||group_code||']'||name_zh AS REVALUE_ALL from t_lm_b_hotelgroup where (:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(group_code) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR name_zh LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' ) order by group_code

select '['||ID||']'||USERGROUP_NAME AS REVALUE_ALL from t_lm_usergroup where (:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (ID LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR NLS_LOWER(USERGROUP_NAME) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' ) order by ID

select '['||ID||']'||TAG_NAME AS REVALUE_ALL from t_tag_info where ((:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(PINYIN_SHORT) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR NLS_LOWER(TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' )) AND ((:CITYNAME IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(CITY_ID) LIKE '%'||:CITYNAME||'%')) order by ID

select '['||bed_code||']'||bed_name AS REVALUE_ALL from t_room_bed where ((:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (lower(bed_code) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (lower(bed_name) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%')) order by id

select '['||tif.id||']'||lbc.name_cn||'-'||tif.tag_name||'商圈' AS REVALUE_ALL from t_tag_info tif left join t_lm_b_city lbc on tif.city_id= lbc.city_id where (:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR ( (NLS_LOWER(tif.pinyin_long) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(tif.PINYIN_SHORT) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(tif.TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' ) OR (lbc.city_id LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (lbc.name_cn LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(lbc.pinyin) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(lbc.pinyin_short) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(lbc.pinyin)||NLS_LOWER(tif.pinyin_long) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(lbc.pinyin_short)||NLS_LOWER(tif.PINYIN_SHORT) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%') ) order by lbc.seq

select '['||GROUP_CODE||']'||NAME_ZH AS REVALUE_ALL from t_lm_b_hotelgroup where ((:PARAMETERS IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(GROUP_CODE) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR NLS_LOWER(NAME_ZH) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%' OR NLS_LOWER(NAME_EN) LIKE '%'||:PARAMETERS||'%')) order by id
